rukus.text: geuleona sillo jeong-uilobge saneun janeun umul-i issneun cheongug-eulo
hananim-i geudeul ma-eumsog-e issneunjeung-oleul jegeohalini geudeul-eun hyeongje cheoleom eolgulgwa eolgul-eul maju daehadeola
geuan-eseo pigonham-i geudeul-eul eomseubhaji anihamyeo ttohan geudeul-eun gyeolko geugos-eulobuteo chubangdoeji anhnola
naui jungbog-ege illeogalodoe sillo naega gwan-yong-gwa eunhyelo chungmanham ila
geuleona naui beol-eun gotongseuleo un beol-ila
abeulaham-ui sonnimdeul-e gwanha yeo geudeul-ege illeojula
ittae cheonsadeul-i geuege deul-eo ga pyeong-anhasoseo lago insahani sil lo ulineun dangsindeul-i duleobnaida lago abeulaham-i daedabhadeola
ie cheonsadeul-i malhadeola du lyeowo haji malla ulineun chongmyeonghan jihyeleul gajin sanaeaiui sosig-eul dang sinkke jeonhalyeo wassnaida
abeulaham-i malhayeossdeola naideul-eun jeoege sanae aiui sosig-eul jeonhalyeo osyeossdani geu bog-eum-i mueos ibnikka lago mul-eumae
uliga jinsillo dangsinkke jinli ui bog-eum-eul jeonhayeoss-euni silmanghaneun jajung-e issji malla
abeulaham-i daedabhadeola banghwanghaneunja oeeneun nuga junim-ui eunhye leul silmangsikiliyo
joejieun los-ui baegseong-ege jeohui leul bonaesyeossseubnida lago cheonsadeul-i daedabhadeola
geuleona los-ui gajog-eul je-oeha go ulineun geudeul moduleul gujehali yo
geuleona los-ui anaeneun guje doelsu eobs-eumae geunyeoneun beol-eul badge doe lila
